description: Damage from Melee Attacks executed while sprinting or dashing increases by 100%. Deals area-of-effect Damage within a 7-metre radius. Cooldown is 5 seconds.
Secondary Weapon's Damage increases by 20%
While performing Charged Attacks, you take 25% less Health Damage do not lose control upon taking Heavy Hits and you cannot be knocked back
All Squad Members' Abilities recharge 10% faster
Ground Pound's Damage increases by 25%
Jump Pack Dash deals damage that scales with difficulty to enemies along its trajectory and always works as a Perfect Dodge when dodging an attack
After a Finisher, Ground Pound deals 25% more Damage for 10 seconds
Any use of Jump Pack reloads the equipped Ranged weapon and increases Ranged Damage for by 50% for 10 seconds
Damage of Charged Attacks increases by 25%
Contested Health fades 50% more slowly
Melee Damage increases by 15% against Majoris- or Extremis-level enemies
All Squad Members deal 20% more Melee Damage against Extremis- and Terminus-level enemies
After use Jump Pack, you take 30% less Ranged Damage, do not lose control upon taking Heavy Hits and you cannot be knocked back for 15 seconds
Jump Pack recharges 20% faster
A fully prepared Ground Pound deals 20% more Damage, but preparation time increases by 25%

Jump Pack Leap deals Damage to enemies near the takeoff area. Enemies within 1-metre take Damage based on Difficulty Level. After 1-metre the Damage starts to drop-off and does 0 Damage at 5-metres. Can hit up to 20 enemies.
Non-Finisher Gun Strikes also restore 1 Armour Segment
Killing 7 enemies within 6 seconds restores Equipment Charge by 1. Cooldown is 90 seconds.
Enemies hit by Melee Attacks take 15% more Damage for 3 seconds
All Squad Members deal 30% more Gun Strike Damage
Ground Pound deals 100% more Damage, but its radius is reduced by 50%
A Ground Pound kill restores Jump Pack's Charge by 10%
After a perfectly timed Dodge using a Jump Pack Dash, you deal 30% more Damage for 10 seconds
A perfectly timed Dodge using a Jump Pack Dash restores Jump pack's Ability Charge
